name: Village Tanuki
summary:
Village Tanuki is a narrative based, maze chase game.

You are playing as Jun, one of many tanukis (Japanese raccoon dog) that works in a certain tanuki group in a forest. The group is infamous for their excellent job at foraging and distributing berries throughout other tanukis in the forest. Your job is to collect berries from human villages to please your boss. Can you do it?
